tweakmyclient.gui.title: Tweak My Client Config - Version: %s (%s)
tweakmyclient.config.color.colorBlockHit: Custom the overlay fill color of the block hit box.
Custom the overlay outline color of the block hit box.
tweakmyclient.config.disable.disableAtta: Disable attacks on entities in the list.
tweakmyclient.config.disable.disableClie: Disable block event rendering (eg pistons animations).

Disable entity updates in the list on the client.
The priority of this setting is higher than the following: 
- disableClientEntityTNTUpdates
- disableClientEntityWitherUpdates
- disableClientEntityZombieVillagerUpdates

Disable TNT entity updates on the client.
Maybe useful for TNT related machines.

Disable wither entity updates on the client.
Maybe it's useful for fake peace.

Disable zombie villager entity updates on the client.
Maybe it's useful for fake peace.

Disable rendering of entities in the list.
The priority of this setting is higher than the following: 
- disableEntityTNTRendering
- disableEntityWitherRendering
- disableEntityZombieVillagerRendering

Disable TNT entity rendering on the client.
Maybe it's useful for fake peace.

Disable wither entity rendering on the client.
Maybe it's useful for fake peace.

Disable zombie villager entity rendering on the client.
Maybe it's useful for fake peace.
tweakmyclient.config.disable.disableCrys: Disable rendering of EndCrystal Beams on client.
tweakmyclient.config.disable.disableFovA: Disable speed multiplier effect fov transform.
tweakmyclient.config.disable.disableGuiS: Disable gui shadow overlay rendering when gui is opening.
tweakmyclient.config.disable.disableItem: Disable items with enchanted glowing effects.
tweakmyclient.config.disable.disableRend: Disable boss bar rendering when player is near boss.
Disable the box that indicates when you have effects.
Disable fire overlay rendering when player is on fire.
Disable frozen overlay rendering when player is stuck in powder snow.
Disable mask overlay rendering when player is wearing pumpkin.
tweakmyclient.config.disable.disableSlow: Cancels slowness effects caused by honey, soul sand and using items.
tweakmyclient.config.feature.featureAuto: When you are approaching the ladder / vine and raises your head, you will automatically climb.

Automatically reconnects when you disconnect from the server.
Adaptive AuthMe, OAuth, ReAuth and In-Game Account Switcher session validation.
Automatically respawns you whenever you die.
tweakmyclient.config.feature.featureCust: Enable overlay fills for pointing to block hit boxes.
Enable overlay outline for pointing to block hit boxes.

Enable window icon override.
You can define your own icons using the following resource pack namespace files:
tweakmyclient:icons/icon_16x16.png
tweakmyclient:icons/icon_32x32.png
Note: You must reload the resource pack to apply the file changes.
tweakmyclient.config.feature.featureDayl: Override the client's world time to the daytime you want.
tweakmyclient.config.feature.featureLowH: When your health is too low, use action bar to send a warning message.
tweakmyclient.config.feature.featureOpen: Shows whether you are fishing in 'open water' and draws a box around the area used for the open water calculation.
tweakmyclient.config.feature.featureUnfo: Will not render anything when your Minecraft window is not focused.
tweakmyclient.config.generic.autoDropInt: How many ticks per interval to perform auto drop.
tweakmyclient.config.generic.autoReconne: How many seconds to wait for auto reconnection.
tweakmyclient.config.generic.breakAnimat:
For customBlockHitBoxOverlay digging animations, it is highly recommended to enable customBlockHitBoxOverlayDisableDepthTest.
Down - As the excavation progresses, the size of the boxes of customBlockHitBoxOverlay slowly decreases from top to bottom.
None - No animation.
Shrink - As the excavation proceeds, the size of the boxes of customBlockHitBoxOverlay slowly shrink from the outside inwards. This option needs to be enabled for customBlockHitBoxOverlayDisableDepthTest to work properly
tweakmyclient.config.generic.crystalBeam:
Select which mode of EndCrystal Beams to disable.
ALL - No beams will be rendered.
Fixed - Disable only the beams pointing to the specified coordinates.
Tracking - Only the beams closest to the EndDragon is disabled.
tweakmyclient.config.generic.customBlock: Disable the depth test when rendering blockHitBoxOverlayFill and blockHitBoxOverlayOutline, which will not operate on occlusion relations. The general experience is better when breakAnimationMode is not None.
featureCustomBlockHitBoxOverlayFill will enable the rainbow color change, using the alpha provided by colorBlockHitBoxOverlayFill.
Enable customBlockHitBoxOverlay optimisation of the linking block.
featureCustomBlockHitBoxOverlayOutline will enable the rainbow color change, using the alpha provided by colorBlockHitBoxOverlayOutline.
tweakmyclient.config.generic.customWindo: If enabled, the title will be taken from listCustomWindowTitleWithActivity when the game is active, otherwise it will be taken from listCustomWindowTitle.
If enable, get random titles from listCustomWindowTitle and listCustomWindowTitleWithActivity, otherwise always get the first element of the list.
tweakmyclient.config.generic.daylightOve: The time set when overriding the client's world time.
tweakmyclient.config.generic.enderPortal:
If endPortalRendererFix is enabled, the ender portal renders in the specified mode.
The available modes are as follows:
Actual - Rendering the ender portal using its hit box.
Full - Rendering the ender portal as a full block.
Legacy - Rendering the ender portal with Minecraft 21w13a below.
Modern - Rendering the ender portal with Minecraft 21w13a and above.
tweakmyclient.config.generic.getTargetBl:
Gets the position of the looking block.
This feature is used to get the position of the farthest block you point to.
tweakmyclient.config.generic.lowHealthTh: Trigger threshold of low health warning.
tweakmyclient.config.generic.openConfigG: A hotkey to open the in-game Config GUI.
tweakmyclient.config.generic.syncInvento: Try to send fake data to the server in order to get the correct player inventory data from the server.
Try to send mining abort packets to server in order to get the correct blocks data from the server.
tweakmyclient.config.generic.targetBlock: Maximum line tracing distance of target block position.
Position tracing format sent to public chat.

The block tracing position will be sent in this mode.
private - Only you can see
public - Send to public chat
tweakmyclient.config.list.listAutoDropBl:
Auto drop item black list.
All items in this list won't be auto dropped.
tweakmyclient.config.list.listAutoDropWh:
Auto drop item white list.
All items in this list will be auto dropped.
tweakmyclient.config.list.listDisableAtt:
Disable attack entity list.
All entities in this list will not be attacked.
tweakmyclient.config.list.listDisableCli:
Disable client entity updates list.
All entities in this list will not be updated.

Disable client entity rendering list.
All entities in this list will not be rendered.
tweakmyclient.config.list.listItemGlowin:
Disable items glowing list.
All items in this list will not be glowed.
tweakmyclient.config.patch.chunkEdgeLagF: Disable the light update queue when unloading chunks, this will reduce the lag when crossing chunk borders at some times.
tweakmyclient.config.patch.disableLitema: Disable easyPlace failure that annoying prompt window.

Disable schematic version checking.
Note: This may cause problems.
tweakmyclient.config.patch.disableResour: Are you annoyed with the "Incompatible" prompt for the resource pack, turn off that boring prompt!
tweakmyclient.config.patch.endPortalRend: Fixing the endPortal to only render materials at the top.
tweakmyclient.config.patch.forceDebugInf: Always show full debug information, even if game rule reducedDebugInfo is true.
tweakmyclient.config.patch.forcePistonWi: The pickaxe will no longer be used as an effective mining tool for pistons.
tweakmyclient.config.patch.litematicaSch:
Make WAILA compatible to show litematica schematic.
- For 1.18 and above, Jade is supported. (Recommend)
- For 1.16 and above, Wthit is supported.
- For 1.15 and below, Hwyla is supported.
tweakmyclient.message.globalEventListene: §e[GlobalEvent]§f: Ender Dragon Defeated at [x: %d, y: %d, z: %d]
§e[GlobalEvent]§f: End Portal Activated at  [x: %d, y: %d, z: %d]
